alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 2:22PM PDT until April 21 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Gusty South Winds Wednesday into Thursday Morning... .A winter storm will bring gusty southerly winds to the northern Sacramento Valley Wednesday through Thursday morning with wind gusts up to 35 to 45 mph possible. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO 8 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 35 to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern and Central Sacramento Valley. * WHEN...From 8 AM Wednesday to 8 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Gusty winds could impact high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley
